title: Evolving trends and challenges in sustainable architectural design; a practice perspective
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Emeka J. Mba, Francis O. Okeke, Ajuluchukwu E. Igwe, Chinelo A. Ozigbo, Peter I. Oforji, Ikechukwu W. Ozigbo
